title: Recipe detail action buttons overflow on mobile
description: On mobile viewport (375px), the recipe detail page action buttons (Rescrape, Enrich with AI, Customize with AI, Add to Shopping List, Add to Meal Plan, Edit, Delete) are in a single non-wrapping row that overflows the screen. The Edit and Delete buttons are completely cut off and inaccessible. The Back link also overlaps with the first button.
